LanguageData.Alien_Momu.label: momu
LanguageData.Alien_Momu.description: A mostly female race with long ears, Momu prize the more simple things in life, like community, farming and tend to form tight-knit communities. They have a raw vegetarian diet, and cannot digest meat.
LanguageData.Alien_Momu.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.Alien_Momu.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.Alien_Momu.tools.3.label: head
